creator: Antada Games
descriptionHtml:
Free Mahjong Game is the most popular board puzzle game in the world. This mahjong game is your perfect match for playing some relaxing matching tiles.
Mahjong is a fun, easy to learn, matching game that will train your brain with thousand of Puzzles for hours of endless Fun!

This free, fun solitaire Mahjong game is also known as Mahjongg Trails, Shanghai Mah Jong, Chinese Mah-jong, Mahjong Titan, Top Mahjong, Majong, Kyodai.
All with the classic matching game play where you match identical pairs of free Mahjong tiles.

How to Play Mahjong:
- The goal of the game is to remove all tiles out of the board by pairs.
- Match mahjong tiles with the same picture and they will disappear.
- Only unblocked tiles can be picked.
- It’s a race against time, the faster you go the more points you score.

Mah-jong Solitaire Features:
- Over 900 free mahjongg boards and more to come
- Beautiful HD graphics and various layouts
- Unique layout: mahjongg toy chest tiles, candy mahjong tiles, christmas mahjong tiles, hallowen mahjong tiles, Hanafuda tiles!
- Intelligent free hints for matching majung easily
- Unlimited free undos
- Unlimited shuffles mahjongg
- NO time limit for playing mojang!
- Daily Mojang Challenges: unblock all challenging modes!
- Auto Fit: larger cubis mahjong tiles, it can be turn on/off in Setting
- Customizable backgrounds
- High scores and personal statistics
- Sound that can be turned on/off
- Designed for Tablet and phone support
- No WIFI? No Problem! You can play offline anytime.

Fun facts about Mahjong:
- Mahjong is considered to be a great memory game or brain game for mahjongg fans of all ages.
- The original Majong game can be played with multiple people, but this offline game is a single player game that can be played with no wifi required.
- This free Mahjong Solitaire games is better than american mahjong, more exciting than microsoft mahjong and more colorful then hong kong mahjong.

Why Play Mahjongg?
- Train Your Brain. Complete fun puzzles to keep your mind sharp.
- Play mahjong classic games offline on your flights and trips.
- There’s no timer or move counter to ensure the game is relaxing and stress free.


Play the No. 1 Mahjong Free board puzzle game on Android now and see why everyone loves this classic game!
If you like matching games, you’ll love this majong classic.


Support Us 💁‍♂️
Our team is working extremely hard to make free spades card games for your needs.
If you have any feedback for our spades card games, please send us an email.
If you like our game, please rate us on the play store and share it among your friends.

title: Mahjong Solitaire: Tile Match

container.value: No 1 Nguyen Van Nguyen, Ward Tan Dinh, District 01, Ho Chi Minh City.

creator: Antada Games
descriptionHtml:
Free Mahjong Game is the most popular board puzzle game in the world. This mahjong game is your perfect match for playing some relaxing matching tiles.
Mahjong is a fun, easy to learn, matching game that will train your brain with thousand of Puzzles for hours of endless Fun!

This free, fun solitaire Mahjong game is also known as Mahjongg Trails, Shanghai Mah Jong, Chinese Mah-jong, Mahjong Titan, Top Mahjong, Majong, Kyodai.
All with the classic matching game play where you match identical pairs of free Mahjong tiles.

How to Play Mahjong:
- The goal of the game is to remove all tiles out of the board by pairs.
- Match mahjong tiles with the same picture and they will disappear.
- Only unblocked tiles can be picked.
- It’s a race against time, the faster you go the more points you score.

Mah-jong Solitaire Features:
- Over 900 free mahjongg boards and more to come
- Beautiful HD graphics and various layouts
- Unique layout: mahjongg toy chest tiles, candy mahjong tiles, christmas mahjong tiles, hallowen mahjong tiles, Hanafuda tiles!
- Intelligent free hints for matching majung easily
- Unlimited free undos
- Unlimited shuffles mahjongg
- NO time limit for playing mojang!
- Daily Mojang Challenges: unblock all challenging modes!
- Auto Fit: larger cubis mahjong tiles, it can be turn on/off in Setting
- Customizable backgrounds
- High scores and personal statistics
- Sound that can be turned on/off
- Designed for Tablet and phone support
- No WIFI? No Problem! You can play offline anytime.

Fun facts about Mahjong:
- Mahjong is considered to be a great memory game or brain game for mahjongg fans of all ages.
- The original Majong game can be played with multiple people, but this offline game is a single player game that can be played with no wifi required.
- This free Mahjong Solitaire games is better than american mahjong, more exciting than microsoft mahjong and more colorful then hong kong mahjong.

Why Play Mahjongg?
- Train Your Brain. Complete fun puzzles to keep your mind sharp.
- Play mahjong classic games offline on your flights and trips.
- There’s no timer or move counter to ensure the game is relaxing and stress free.


Play the No. 1 Mahjong Free board puzzle game on Android now and see why everyone loves this classic game!
If you like matching games, you’ll love this majong classic.


Support Us 💁‍♂️
Our team is working extremely hard to make free spades card games for your needs.
If you have any feedback for our spades card games, please send us an email.
If you like our game, please rate us on the play store and share it among your friends.
